entry.title: Odoo the underdog python killer app. A python framework for web based business apps.
entry.summary:
Description

Antony Lesuisse - Odoo the underdog python killer app. A python framework for web based business apps. [EuroPython 2015] [22 July 2015] [Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]

Odoo is used by 2 millions of users, although relatively unknown in the python community, it has a vibrant community and is one of the most active python open source project.

I will present you the Odoo framework and how it can help to be more productive when building web based business apps. I will highlight its advantages compared to more popular framework such as django.
